snippet: A type of Medicare in which private insurers provide coverage remains attractive to Americans, but proposed reductions in government payments may change the benefits offered.
abstract: Changes to payments made by the federal government to Medicare Advantage insurers contained within the health care reform law have set some Medicare Advantage subscribers scrambling.
lead_paragraph: A type of Medicare in which private insurers provide coverage remains attractive to Americans, but proposed reductions in government payments may change the benefits offered.

headline.main: Medicare Changes Prompt Enrollees to Reconsider Plans
headline.print_headline: Medicare Changes Prompt Enrollees to Reconsider Plans

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
